annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Luca Banti is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) takes a short corner kick.

Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) blows a clear opportunity to score a goal. He was one on one with Wojciech Szczesny inside the six yard box and attempted to put the ball low into the middle of the target, but was denied by a great save. The ball is out of play. A goal scoring opportunity from a corner for Juventus.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It is time for a substitution. Francesco Totti (AS Roma) is on for Mohamed Salah.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) is booked for saying more than Luca Banti was willing to tolerate.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 5 min. of added time.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Mehdi Benatia (Juventus) picks up a yellow card.
Emerson (AS Roma) is moving okay again after that injury scare.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Looks like Emerson (AS Roma) is struggling after picking up a knock. Hopefully he can run it off.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) works the corner short.
Mario Lemina (Juventus) takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's not a big threat for the goalkeeper as his effort is blocked by a defender. The referee signals a corner kick to Juventus.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Mario Mandzukic (Juventus) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: A substitution has been made. Radja Nainggolan goes off and Juan Jesus (AS Roma) comes on.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Claudio Marchisio (Juventus) in, Juan Cuadrado out.
Paulo Dybala (Juventus) misses a chance to score! He produces a header from inside the box, but it goes narrowly over the crossbar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luciano Spalletti decides to make a substitution. Diego Perotti will be replaced by Clement Grenier (AS Roma).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It will be a substitution. Paulo Dybala (Juventus) is ready to enter the pitch as Stefano Sturaro walks off.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) receives the ball inside the box, reacts quickly and without any problems stabs the ball inside the right post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Massimiliano Allegri has decided to make a change. Dani Alves (Juventus) replaces Stephan Lichtsteiner.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) got a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A dangerous looking corner kick from Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) is cleared to safety by the defence.

Juventus are passing the ball across the pitch and keep possession. However, an opponent intercepts a pass and the situation changes. The ball goes out of play and Juventus have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) makes himself some space on the edge of the penalty area and pulls the trigger. His accurate effort goes off the post into the bottom right corner. He makes it 2:1.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) is the one who receives a yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) blasts the ball from just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by the defender. The referee blows his whistle, AS Roma are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Mario Lemina (Juventus) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The game is interrupted because of a yellow card that is shown to Federico Fazio (AS Roma).

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The game restarts for the second half.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Luca Banti has ended the first half by blowing the whistle.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 min. of stoppage time to be played.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
A cross into the box from Kwadwo Asamoah (Juventus) is cleared. Juventus force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.
Kwadwo Asamoah (Juventus) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The referee points to the corner flag and Juventus will take a corner.
Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) is unlucky with a goal bound effort from the edge of the box. A fortuitous save from Wojciech Szczesny stops the ball from going into the middle of the goal.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) tries to hit a shot towards goal from long range, but he miskicks the ball and it flies high over the crossbar.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) fires the rebound into the middle of the goal after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 1:1.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will send the ball into the penalty box.
AS Roma move the ball around well as they wait for an opportunity to shoot, but the attack is halted as they lose possession. AS Roma will take a corner kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal 0:1! Gonzalo Higuain laid the ball off to Mario Lemina (Juventus), who slots it into the back of the net from close range, leaving the goalkeeper helpless.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) is intercepted by the defence. AS Roma have been awarded a corner kick.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) takes the free kick but it is cleared by the first defender. AS Roma force a corner. They send men into the box.
Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) takes a mid range shot, but it lacks accuracy and it goes way over the bar.
Luca Banti blows his whistle and it's Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Miralem Pjanic (Juventus) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) crosses the ball forward but it is intercepted. The ball is out of play. Juventus will have a chance to score from a corner.
Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) escapes without any punishment from the referee after using excessive force to foul his opponent.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Mario Mandzukic (Juventus) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.

AS Roma play a few nice passes from player to player, but their possession doesn't last long as an opposition player intercepts a pass. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to AS Roma.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just started.
The players are on the pitch and AS Roma will have the kick off.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Luca Banti.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: We now know the starting lineups. You can find them in the match details of this match.
Hello, welcome to our live play by play commentaries. You will be able to see a written form of all the interesting moments of the game, so you won't miss a thing. Sit back and have fun.
Juventus have a rock solid defence this season as they have conceded only 26 goals so far.
Gonzalo Higuain is the leading goal scorer for Juventus with 24 goals so far.
AS Roma have won 14x at home this season.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Luca Banti is looking at his watch and immediately ends this match.
